short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to look up Crunchbase data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disruptive Discovery is a Chrome extension developed to streamline the process of searching for startup names directly from the user's browser, leveraging the comprehensive Crunchbase API. This tool is designed for startup enthusiasts and researchers who wish to quickly verify the uniqueness of a startup name or seek inspiration for naming their own startups. By integrating search functionality into the browser, Disruptive Discovery offers a convenient and efficient way to access a vast database of startup names and related information.
